sentence: bring the right purple block to the left side of the red block in the front center
pick up the red block in the front center and stack it on the purple block next to it
attach the middle red block to the left side of the first purple block you moved
bring the red block you have not moved yet and place it to the right side of the front purple block
rotate the front yellow block by 45 degrees and align it with the left side of the second red block you moved
